example.text: President Biden has overseen the worst border crisis in our nation’s history, with more than 5 million illegal crossings since he took office. It is a crisis of his own creation, & tomorrow when he allows Title 42 to expire, it will become a catastrophe of his own creation. [[url]]

The president can’t raise the debt ceiling by himself — he has to work with Congress, and he must negotiate with Speaker McCarthy and House Republicans. Let’s hope he can see his way to negotiating because the fiscal stability of our country is hanging in the balance. [[url]]
That is from the 2023 enacted budget for the IRS, over and above the $80 billion funding increase the IRS got just last August. Think about that.

Unfortunately, there is a lot more I could say about the problems with Ms. Sohn's nomination, but I will stop here. Suffice it to say that I cannot think of a less appropriate candidate for this position.

The president can’t raise the debt ceiling by himself — he has to work with Congress, and he must negotiate with Speaker McCarthy and House Republicans. Let’s hope he can see his way to negotiating because the fiscal stability of our country is hanging in the balance. [[url]]

The Biden administration continues to pass the buck & stonewall accountability measures for its disastrous withdrawal from Afghanistan. My bill with [[user]] would compel the State Department to release the cable warning of the Afghanistan collapse. [[url]]
